entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Trois-Rivières
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:22 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing rain or rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain changing to rain this afternoon. Snow over northern sections early this afternoon. Fog patches developing late this afternoon. Local snowfall amount 10 cm over northern sections. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then partly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
